plot: A woman is forced by her husband to be silent forever. But, when listening to nature she finds her own song and a hopes for a new life.
title: El Canto
plot_es: A woman is forced by her husband to be silent forever. But, when listening to nature she finds her own song and a hopes for a new life.
plot_en: A woman is forced by her husband to be silent forever. But, when listening to nature she finds her own song and a hopes for a new life.
